data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - The Nothing Battles Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
Do you feel the need to make your game rock just a little bit harder? The Nothing Battles features fourteen instrumental hard rock tracks from Kain Vinosec that will give your game a unique touch of awesome.

This Music Pack Contains

  • 14 full-length hard rock instrumental tracks.
  • Looped OGG Vorbis files for RPG Maker VX/Ace and WAVs for IG Maker.
  • The MP3 version of the album is included as a bonus!
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
